page.title: 17MAINLINES THROUGH OUR AREA.
page.content: LONDON ROAD runs through the middle of our area.Next to London Road is the Hilltop Hotel and beside it is"B.B.C. Radio Cumbria".The main London to Glasgow railway line runs parallel to the River Petteril and London Road and a branch line leads to a carriage sidings alongside Radio Cumbria.Two nationally known employers Cavray (who supply meat products) and Goldenlay eggs have factories on London Road.A large telephone communications tower dominates the sky line and beside it is an Esso oil storage depot. Harraby industrial estate is mostly light industry connected with the haulage and building trade,notably Robson's Border transport.The Border company of I.T.V also have studios there.To the east of our block is the Garlands mental hospital and the main route south,the M6 motorway.
